title: MS Dhoni Leads CSK to Another Thrilling Victory!
content: CSK secured a last-over win against MI as Dhoni finished the game in style with a massive six.

title: Ruturaj Gaikwad Smashes Century in IPL 2025
content: Ruturaj Gaikwad played a breathtaking knock, scoring 102* off 55 balls to guide CSK to victory.

title: Jadeja's All-Round Show Stuns RCB!
content: Ravindra Jadeja's 3 wickets and 40 runs off 18 balls helped CSK crush RCB in a dominant performance.

title: CSK vs KKR: Chennai Set to Face Tough Challenge
content: CSK is preparing for a tough battle against KKR as both teams are in top form in IPL 2025.

title: Deepak Chahar Returns from Injury, Ready for Action
content: CSK's star pacer Deepak Chahar has recovered from his hamstring injury and is set to make a strong comeback.

title: CSK Introduces New Training Facility in Chennai
content: Chennai Super Kings have launched a state-of-the-art training facility to groom future stars.

title: Shivam Dube's Power-Hitting Stuns Opponents!
content: Dube smashed 5 sixes in an over, reminding fans of Yuvraj Singh's iconic 6-sixes moment.

title: CSK Merchandise Store Opens Online – Get Your Gear Now!
content: CSK has launched its official online store, offering jerseys, caps, and exclusive fan merchandise.

title: Ajay Mandal Shines in His CSK Debut
content: Ajay Mandal made an impressive debut for CSK, scoring a quick 50 and taking 2 crucial wickets.

title: CSK Announces Free Entry for Special Fans on Match Day
content: CSK will allow free entry for underprivileged children and elderly fans in their next home match.

title: CSK’s New Fast Bowler Matheesha Pathirana Impresses in Nets
content: Young fast bowler Matheesha Pathirana has been clocking 150 km/h in the CSK nets, impressing coaches.

title: Mahesh Theekshana’s Mystery Spin Baffles SRH Batsmen
content: Theekshana took 4 wickets in a game-changing spell as CSK dominated SRH in IPL 2025.

title: MS Dhoni: 'I Still Have More to Offer to CSK'
content: In an emotional post-match interview, Dhoni hinted at continuing his CSK journey beyond IPL 2025.

title: CSK vs DC: Epic Rivalry Continues in IPL 2025
content: CSK takes on Delhi Capitals in a highly anticipated battle as fans gear up for a thrilling contest.

title: CSK Starts a New Grassroots Academy for Young Cricketers
content: The franchise has launched a cricket academy to train young talent across India.
